Articles.Content:
Hello everyone!

After finishing of the [VTOL-fighter "Stribog"](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/114724-VTOL-fighter-Stribog-%28with-ejection-seat%29) I decided to continue creating of a little fighters with hollow cabin. So meet the second one:

**Fighter S-1 "Needle"**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/4lwtP)

S-1 "Needle" is a little and easy to fly fighter. It has RCS which you can use for landings (it's hard to land a little when fuel tanks is empty) and ejection seat for emergency situations. The only problem of "Needle" is a little amount of fuel, so don't fly to far away from KSC ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Craft's characteristics:

Parts - 308

Mass, t - 6,8

Height, m - 2,0

Weight, m - 4,7

Lenght, m - 6,7

Hotkeys:

1 - toggle main engine

Abort - activate ejection seat

Click [>>here<<](http://www./download/6e21xjxiy337lg8/S-1+Needle.craft) to download a .craft-file!

Thank you for your attention!

Fly safe!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-07T20:23:31Z" title="04/07/2015 08:23  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 7, 2015</time> by Nik\_601**

Is this for stock or far aerodynamics?

Also, +rep.

> 
> Is this for stock or far aerodynamics?

It was built for stock version of KSP (the title says it's a stock craft). But you can try to launch it with FAR ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Nice. You deserve some rep... Although it doesn't exactly look like a needle. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Nice. You deserve some rep... Although it doesn't exactly look like a needle. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

It "pricks" like a needle ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Nice design Nik! And was the front inspired by Ranger?

> 
> Nice design Nik! And was the front inspired by Ranger?

You've almost guessed ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I was inspired by a ship which was stolen by Cooper in the end of the film

> 
> The one on the left?
> http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot1380_zpsbo2llbxl.png.html[http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1380_zpsbo2llbxl.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot1380_zpsbo2llbxl.png)

Yes!

P.S. What mod is it? These models're really cool

> 
> Yes!
> P.S. What mod is it? These models're really cool

[Interstellar mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99841-Endurance-%28from-Interstellar%29-0-4-0-Mini-Ranger-dev%21)

> 
> Yes!
> P.S. What mod is it? These models're really cool

Wow how have you managed to miss that mod?
Endurance mod was less known when this was created.
Its neat though, but where are the weapons? if its a "fighter", how am i supposed to actually kill stuff with it?
